author: Joanna Stern
title: Alexa, Siri, Cortana: The Problem With All-Female Digital Assistants - WSJ
text:
JoannaStern Feb. 21, 2017 3:31 p.m. ET 
Over on Greek Row is the Delta Phi AI sorority. They donâ€™t sip boxed wine or throw carwash fundraisers; instead they learn responses to every single question humankind throws at them, from weather reports to a calculation of pi to the 65th digit. 
Notable members include Siri, Cortana, Google Assistant and the newly elected chapter president, Alexa. They have tried to arrange keggers with the Ro-bro fraternity, but it only had one... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
